body:
I just hit 100 subscribers, and guess who its all thanks to? You guys! You guys were my first subscribers when I hit 10, 25,50,75, and now 100! I never would of thought I would get to 100! I was thinking 25 tops!  I will proceed making videos and trying to grow my channel, If I ever become big like around 5k subscribers I will play avicus alot :D And I play avicus alot on my channel right now to. Thank you guys so much!


And my map got accepted! PermaFrost 1.0!

THANK YOU AVICUS!

Thanks Again,
-Ebirdy9

title: Life is happy now 100 subs + Map Accepted
